articles.title: Coronavirus Epidemic Gives Smokers Another (Scary) Reason to Quit : Shots - Health News - NPR
articles.description: Increasing evidence suggests people who smoke are more likely to become severely ill and die from COVID-19 than nonsmokers. Some people are using that as inspiration to quit.
articles.content:
Research indicates that smokers and vapers are at increased risk of more serious illness if they get infected with the novel coronavirus.
Tegra Stone Nuess/Getty Images
In 40 years of smoking, Katie Kennedy has tried four times to quit but always went back … [+8314 chars]
